function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Mixed perspectives on lockdown life may lead to conflicting interpretations of the images.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variety of responses in category 7 may indicate different emotional and spatial needs, possibly reflecting differing living conditions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Less pleasant aspects associated with routine activities may reveal hygiene and maintenance challenges in the living environments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Participants discussing life during lockdown and proposing improvements could lead to the spread of unverified advice or misinformation related to disease prevention.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Joint analysis from different perspectives could lead to overlooking specific health and safety risks associated with contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Acceptance and normalization of the current situation may lead to reduced adherence to disease prevention measures and guidelines.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Urban dwellings with multiple family members","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low level of perceived dedication to care of children and dependents","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of space and resources for leisure and sports activities","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poorly lit and uncomfortable spaces","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exterior-interior transition and disinfection areas","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of organization in storage rooms and spaces","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close social interactions in the living rooms and open spaces increase the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of use of individual refrigeration equipment despite its availability increases the risk of discomfort and potential health issues in high temperatures.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased hot water usage in households leading to higher risk of waterborne diseases transmission.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased usage of household appliances involving water consumption leading to potential waterborne diseases transmission.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher energy usage in households leading to potential indoor air pollution and respiratory health risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inherent biases in the recruitment of participants for the study, leading to potential underrepresentation of vulnerable areas and populations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Digital gaps and limitations in the use of internet forms leading to potential exclusion of certain demographics and populations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential bias in participant qualification due to a higher representation of teleworking individuals.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential over-representation of categories in the data sample","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential exposure to contagious diseases during qualitative research settings","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of exploration of the impact of daily tasks on households during covid-19 lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in energy consumption patterns due to altered habits","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Omission of household income from the questionnaire","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative spatial perception and mental health effects due to poor housing quality","category":"Structures","con...  ...fidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of spatial flexibility and independent supplies in dwellings","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor
